card_text:
Play: Shuffle a card from your discard pile into your deck.
Fate: Each player shuffles their discard pile into their deck.

Each time your opponent chooses their active house, they must name a house on your identity card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card does not match the named house, fulfill Ask Again Later.
At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have exactly 6, fulfill Bad Omen.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent shuffles their deck, fulfill Expect the Unexpected.
During your opponent’s turn, when your opponent adds their archives to their hand, fulfill Fate Laughs at Your Plans.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent forges a key, fulfill Forge Ahead With Confidence.
During your opponent’s turn, after an enemy creature is used to fight, fulfill Go Forth and Conquer.

At the end of your turn, you may flip Heads, I Win.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent plays a creature adjacent to a creature of the same house, fulfill Heads, I Win.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent steals one or more  from you, fulfill It Only Gets Worse.
During your opponent’s turn, after they play a creature, fulfill Look How Far You've Come.
After your opponent chooses an active house that matches no cards in play, fulfill Outlook Not So Good.
During your opponent’s turn, after an enemy creature is used to reap, fulfill Overreach.
At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have  in their pool equal to or greater than the current key cost, fulfill Signs Point to Yes.
At the start of your opponent’s turn, if each player has the same number of creatures, fulfill Stars Aligned.

At the end of your turn, you may flip Tails, You Lose.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent plays a creature adjacent to a creature belonging to a different house, fulfill Tails, You Lose.
During your opponent's turn, after your opponent draws a card outside of their “draw cards step”, fulfill The Cards Will Tell.
At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have more  in their pool than you, fulfill The Early Bird.
During your opponent's turn, after 3 or more creatures have been destroyed that turn, fulfill The End is Nigh.
At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have less  in their pool than you, fulfill The Second Mouse.

card_title: Treat Each Action as Your Last
card_title_en: Treat Each Action as Your Last
card_text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent plays their second action that turn, fulfill Treat Each Action as Your Last
When a card is placed under Trust Your Feelings, name a house. The next time your opponent chooses the named house as their active house, fulfill Trust Your Feelings.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent discards a cards from their hand, fulfill Wasteful Regret.
During your opponent's turn, after a friendly creature is dealt damage, fulfill Wounds into Wisdom.
